programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: The dark lord Voldemort rises to ultimate power over the magical world, so the teenage wizard and his friends set out on a mission to find the magical horcruxes - artefacts containing parts of the evil wizard's soul that hold the key to destroying him. The first half of the two-part conclusion to the fantasy saga, starring Daniel Radcliffe, Ralph Fiennes, Emma Watson and Rupert Grint.(n)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: The young wizard continues his search for the artefacts containing fragments of the dark lord Voldemort's soul. Time is running out, as the evil sorcerer is aware of Harry's mission, and marshals his forces for a final, devastating attack on Harry and his friends at Hogwarts school. Conclusion of the fantasy saga, with Daniel Radcliffe, Ralph Fiennes, Rupert Grint, Emma Watson and Alan Rickman.(n)

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: A teenager living in a peaceful community is sent to assist the old man who is the keeper of the settlement's history. The assignment leads him to uncover the dark secrets behind his idyllic surroundings, and he realises he must find a way to escape. Sci-fi adventure based on Lois Lowry's novel, starring Jeff Bridges, Brenton Thwaites and Meryl Streep.(n)

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: An obnoxious TV weatherman reporting on a small town's annual festival finds himself caught in a bizarre time loop, and is forced to relive the same day over and over again. While at first he tries to exploit his predicament, he is ultimately driven to mend his ways and adopt a less cynical attitude. Comedy, starring Bill Murray, Andie MacDowell, Chris Elliott and Stephen Tobolowsky.(n)

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: A bumbling secret agent becomes Britain's leading spy following the assassination of all the country's other espionage experts. Single-handedly he sets out to unmask a mysterious villain responsible for stealing the Crown Jewels - but no one is prepared to believe a sinister billionaire is the culprit. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, John Malkovich, Natalie Imbruglia and Ben Miller.(n)

programme.title: Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: Two unemployed executives decide to open a day-care centre, believing they have found an easy way to make a profit - but instead discover looking after a horde of rampant kids is not as simple as it seems. Family comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jeff Garlin, Steve Zahn and Anjelica Huston.(n)

programme.title: Dino Time
programme.desc: Three children accidentally activate a time-travel device which transports them 65 million years back in time, where they are protected by a friendly dinosaur. But can they find a way to return to the 21st century while steering clear of all sorts of prehistoric dangers? Animation, featuring the voices of Melanie Griffith, Pamela Adlon and Tara Strong.(n)

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge out of Water
programme.desc: The cheery sea creature tries to prevent the precious secret formula from falling into the wrong hands - but when it goes missing, the end of the world approaches. SpongeBob and his friends embark on a quest to get it back, which leads to them developing superpowers and venturing onto dry land. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny and Antonio Banderas.(n)

programme.title: The Book of Life
programme.desc: A man who longs to be a musician instead of a bullfighter like his father has to compete with a childhood friend when they fall for the same woman. Their love triangle catches the eye of the spirits of the dead, leading him on a journey through their bizarre world. Animated adventure, with the voices of Diego Luna, Zoe Saldana and Channing Tatum.(n)

programme.title: Free Willy
programme.desc: A troubled youngster befriends a captive killer whale while working at a marine park. However, their friendship looks set to be short-lived when he learns the park's greedy owners plan to kill the animal, forcing the boy into a race against time to release the creature back into the ocean. Family drama, starring Jason James Richter, Lori Petty and Michael Madsen.(n)

programme.title: Dino Time
programme.desc: Three children accidentally activate a time-travel device which transports them 65 million years back in time, where they are protected by a friendly dinosaur. But can they find a way to return to the 21st century while steering clear of all sorts of prehistoric dangers? Animation, featuring the voices of Melanie Griffith, Pamela Adlon and Tara Strong.(n)

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge out of Water
programme.desc: The cheery sea creature tries to prevent the precious secret formula from falling into the wrong hands - but when it goes missing, the end of the world approaches. SpongeBob and his friends embark on a quest to get it back, which leads to them developing superpowers and venturing onto dry land. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny and Antonio Banderas.(n)

programme.title: The Book of Life
programme.desc: A man who longs to be a musician instead of a bullfighter like his father has to compete with a childhood friend when they fall for the same woman. Their love triangle catches the eye of the spirits of the dead, leading him on a journey through their bizarre world. Animated adventure, with the voices of Diego Luna, Zoe Saldana and Channing Tatum.(n)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: The young wizard continues his search for the artefacts containing fragments of the dark lord Voldemort's soul. Time is running out, as the evil sorcerer is aware of Harry's mission, and marshals his forces for a final, devastating attack on Harry and his friends at Hogwarts school. Conclusion of the fantasy saga, with Daniel Radcliffe, Ralph Fiennes, Rupert Grint, Emma Watson and Alan Rickman.(n)

programme.title: Robot Overlords
programme.desc: In a world controlled by a robots, the human population is constantly monitored and is unable to venture outside. However, a boy manages to turn off his personal surveillance device, enabling him to begin a search for his long-lost father, who may hold the key to saving humanity. Family sci-fi adventure, starring Ben Kingsley, Gillian Anderson and Callan McAuliffe.(n)

programme.title: Dennis
programme.desc: A well-meaning little boy with an inability to stay out of trouble is the bane of his curmudgeonly neighbour, Mr Wilson. But when a thief steals Wilson's coin collection, the tiny terror seizes the chance to make amends and come to the rescue. Slapstick comedy based on the comic strip, starring Walter Matthau, Mason Gamble, Joan Plowright, Christopher Lloyd and Lea Thompson.(n)

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet.(n)

programme.title: Fun with Dick and Jane
programme.desc: A highly paid executive loses everything after his corrupt boss's false accounting ruins the firm and leaves him to take the blame. Flat-broke and with no income or savings to maintain his lavish lifestyle, he and his wife decide the only way to support themselves is to turn to crime. Remake of the 1976 comedy, with Jim Carrey, Tea Leoni, Alec Baldwin and Richard Jenkins.(n)

programme.title: Lethal Weapon
programme.desc: An unstable Vietnam veteran cop teams up with a by-the-book Los Angeles police detective to investigate the apparent suicide of the daughter of a wealthy businessman, leading them to a violent and bloody confrontation with a ruthless drug cartel under the control of a retired US general. Action thriller, starring Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Gary Busey, Mitchell Ryan and Tom Atkins.(n)

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 2
programme.desc: Headstrong cop Martin Riggs and his cautious partner Roger Murtaugh stumble across a plot by a South African diplomat to launder drugs money by shipping gold coins into the US via his embassy. Protected by diplomatic immunity, the crook looks certain to evade the law - while his chief henchman has a connection to Riggs' traumatic past. Action thriller sequel, with Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Joe Pesci, Joss Ackland, Derrick O'Connor and Patsy Kensit.(n)

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 3
programme.desc: Detectives Riggs and Murtaugh team up with a reformed small-time crook and a tough, female internal-affairs investigator to track down a former policeman trafficking impounded weaponry to the bosses of organised crime. Action thriller sequel, starring Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Joe Pesci and Rene Russo.(n)

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: A renegade general and his crack team of mercenaries take over the abandoned fortress prison of Alcatraz and threaten San Francisco with toxic nerve-gas rockets to extort a massive ransom. To break their stranglehold on the city, the FBI sends in a chemical weapons expert and a jailed SAS veteran, chosen because he is the only man to have ever escaped from the infamous penitentiary. Action thriller, with Sean Connery, Nicolas Cage and Ed Harris.(n)

programme.title: Body
programme.desc: Three students break into a house mistakenly thinking it belongs to their friend, and end up accidentally killing the groundskeeper who catches them trespassing. They try to come up with an elaborate lie to cover up their crime, but their consiences begin to trouble them, with deadly consequences. Thriller, starring Helen Rogers, Alexandra Turshen and Lauren Molina.(n)

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: A police forensic psychologist searches for the daughter of a senator, who has been kidnapped from her expensive private school by a media-obsessed teacher, sparking a desperate race to hunt down her psychotic and devilishly intelligent captor before it is too late. Thriller prequel to Kiss the Girls, starring Morgan Freeman, Monica Potter, Michael Wincott, Dylan Baker and Penelope Ann Miller.(n)

programme.title: Carlito's Way
programme.desc: A former gangster is released from jail and vows to go straight, hoping to earn enough money to escape his New York roots - but his misguided loyalty to a crooked lawyer threatens to drag him back into a life of crime. Brian De Palma's thriller, starring Al Pacino, Sean Penn, Penelope Ann Miller, John Leguizamo and Viggo Mortensen.(n)

programme.title: Taken
programme.desc: An American teenager travelling through Europe is abducted by a gang of sex traffickers. However, what the kidnappers do not realise is that the girl's father is a former CIA agent, who employs all his old skills as he searches for the criminals and tries to rescue his daughter. Thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Famke Janssen and Maggie Grace.(n)

programme.title: Dying of the Light
programme.desc: A CIA agent is diagnosed with a degenerative condition that results in him being forced to retire from the world of intelligence. When he receives word that a terrorist who once tortured him has resurfaced, he goes rogue and sets out to assassinate the man while he is still able. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Anton Yelchin and Irene Jacob.(n)

programme.title: Executive Decision
programme.desc: Terrorists armed with the world's most lethal nerve gas take over an airliner and demand a massive ransom - and only a crack team of intelligence experts can stop them before they carry out their threat to destroy Washington, DC. Action thriller, starring Kurt Russell, Steven Seagal, Halle Berry, Oliver Platt, David Suchet and John Leguizamo.(n)

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.(n)

programme.title: The Calling
programme.desc: A small-town cop with a drink problem discovers someone is mutilating and murdering people across her district. She realises that the serial killer is hiding a mysterious message inspired by ancient religious texts and becomes dangerously obsessed with deciphering its meaning. Crime thriller based on Inger Ash Wolfe's novel, starring Susan Sarandon and Donald Sutherland.(n)

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: A bored millionaire masterminds a bank robbery, only to find himself pursued by a glamorous insurance investigator determined to prove his guilt. It is not long before they get embroiled in a passionate affair - but conflicting interests mean they can never really trust one another. Crime drama, starring Steve McQueen, Faye Dunaway, Paul Burke and Yaphet Kotto.(n)

programme.title: Stretch
programme.desc: A cash-strapped chauffeur is up to his neck in debt to a bookie, but thinks that escorting a billionaire around LA will raise enough money to pay off his creditor. Unfortunately, his wealthy passenger turns out to be not only crazy, but also a wanted man. Comedy thriller, starring Patrick Wilson, Chris Pine and Jessica Alba.(n)

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Academic adventurer Robert Langdon is called in by the Vatican to deal with a crisis. The Pope has died and the four cardinals in line to be his successor have all been abducted by a mysterious sect that is threatening to murder them. As he searches for the kidnapped clerics, Langdon discovers the cult has an even more horrific plan in mind. Thriller sequel to The Da Vinci Code, with Tom Hanks and Ewan McGregor.(n)

programme.title: One Hour Photo
programme.desc: A lonely photo technician develops an increasing obsession with a seemingly perfect couple and their child, whose pictures he processes - but when he uncovers evidence of marital infidelity, he resolves to expose the truth, regardless of the cost. Psychological thriller, starring Robin Williams, Connie Nielsen, Michael Vartan, Gary Cole and Dylan Smith.(n)

programme.title: The Untouchables
programme.desc: Incorruptible federal agent Eliot Ness is assigned the task of fighting organised crime in Prohibition-era Chicago and bringing the notorious crime boss Al Capone to justice. Aware crooked police are undermining his investigations, he puts together his own elite squad to take on the Mob. Brian De Palma's crime thriller, with Kevin Costner, Robert De Niro, Andy Garcia and Sean Connery, who won an Oscar for his performance.(n)

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: A freelance former US intelligence agent is recruited alongside a team of fellow mercenaries to take part in an international plot to capture a briefcase from a gang of criminals. However, after the mission is completed, one member of the crew decides to betray his equally ruthless comrades-in-arms - with inevitably explosive results. John Frankenheimer's action thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Jean Reno, Natascha McElhone, Sean Bean, Stellan Skarsgard and Jonathan Pryce.(n)

programme.title: Cape Fear
programme.desc: A psychopathic rapist is released from prison after 14 years and plots revenge on the defence attorney he blames for his imprisonment. Subjecting the lawyer and his family to a terrifying campaign of intimidation, he uses his knowledge of the law to stay untouchable. Martin Scorsese's thriller remake, starring Robert De Niro, Nick Nolte, Jessica Lange and Juliette Lewis, with cameo appearances by Gregory Peck, Robert Mitchum and Martin Balsam, who all appeared in the 1962 original.(n)

programme.title: GoodFellas
programme.desc: An Irish-Italian boy from a poor neighbourhood grows up idolising the glamorous lifestyle of the Mafia. Taken under the wing of a mobster, he rises quickly in the world of organised crime. But he soon has to face the realities of murder and treachery, while his involvement in drug deals puts him at risk from both sides of the law. Martin Scorsese's crime drama, starring Ray Liotta, Robert De Niro and an Oscar-winning Joe Pesci.(n)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.(n)

programme.title: The Gallows
programme.desc: A high-school play ends in tragedy when a boy is accidentally killed during a performance. The school puts on another production of the same show 20 years later which a gang of camcorder-wielding students intend to sabotage - but nobody is prepared for the ghost of the dead boy returning to terrorise the performance. Found-footage horror, starring Reese Mishler and Pfeifer Brown.(n)

programme.title: Tomorrowland: A World Beyond
programme.desc: A boy genius in the 1960s finds his way into a spectacular futuristic metropolis while attempting to promote his idea for a jetpack. Decades later, he has grown into a disillusioned adult, while a girl who has the talent and enthusiasm he has lost also finds her way into this strange new world, and together they attempt to uncover its secrets. Fantasy adventure, starring George Clooney, Britt Robertson and Hugh Laurie.(n)

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An alien arrives on Earth, accompanied by an awesomely powerful robot, on a fateful mission - to decide if the human race deserves to continue - and if not, to wipe it out. The visitor is imprisoned in a military facility, but a scientist helps him escape, hoping to prove that mankind is worth saving. Sci-fi drama remake, starring Keanu Reeves and Jennifer Connelly.(n)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.(n)

programme.title: Little Shop of Horrors
programme.desc: A weedy flower-shop assistant grows a bizarre plant, which he discovers needs to feed on human blood to survive. It grows to a vast size and begins to talk, demanding he commit murder on its behalf. Comedy musical based on the Broadway show, starring Rick Moranis, Ellen Greene, Steve Martin and Bill Murray, with the voice of The Four Tops' Levi Stubbs.(n)

programme.title: Tomorrowland: A World Beyond
programme.desc: A boy genius in the 1960s finds his way into a spectacular futuristic metropolis while attempting to promote his idea for a jetpack. Decades later, he has grown into a disillusioned adult, while a girl who has the talent and enthusiasm he has lost also finds her way into this strange new world, and together they attempt to uncover its secrets. Fantasy adventure, starring George Clooney, Britt Robertson and Hugh Laurie.(n)

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An alien arrives on Earth, accompanied by an awesomely powerful robot, on a fateful mission - to decide if the human race deserves to continue - and if not, to wipe it out. The visitor is imprisoned in a military facility, but a scientist helps him escape, hoping to prove that mankind is worth saving. Sci-fi drama remake, starring Keanu Reeves and Jennifer Connelly.(n)

programme.title: The Gallows
programme.desc: A high-school play ends in tragedy when a boy is accidentally killed during a performance. The school puts on another production of the same show 20 years later which a gang of camcorder-wielding students intend to sabotage - but nobody is prepared for the ghost of the dead boy returning to terrorise the performance. Found-footage horror, starring Reese Mishler and Pfeifer Brown.(n)

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: A father tries to resurrect his dead son by placing him in an enchanted burial ground but the plan backfires with devastating results. Horror, starring Dale Midkiff, Fred Gwynne and Denise Crosby, with a cameo appearance by author Stephen King, whose book provided the basis for the film.(n)

programme.title: Pet Sematary II
programme.desc: A boy's dog is killed by his abusive father, so he and his friend bury the animal in a place believed to hold the power of resurrection. Miraculously, the dog returns to the land of the living, but with a vicious new temperament, and savages the boy's father to death. The terrified son decides to try in turn to resurrect his parent, but with horrific consequences. Horror sequel, with Edward Furlong and Anthony Edwards.(n)

programme.title: Little Shop of Horrors
programme.desc: A weedy flower-shop assistant grows a bizarre plant, which he discovers needs to feed on human blood to survive. It grows to a vast size and begins to talk, demanding he commit murder on its behalf. Comedy musical based on the Broadway show, starring Rick Moranis, Ellen Greene, Steve Martin and Bill Murray, with the voice of The Four Tops' Levi Stubbs.(n)

programme.title: What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: A doctor's wife recovering from a car accident is troubled by terrifying visions of a ghostly girl who seems to be asking for help from beyond the grave. While her husband thinks the experiences are the result of her recent trauma, a psychiatrist urges her to communicate with the spirit. Supernatural thriller, starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Harrison Ford, Diana Scarwid and Joe Morton.(n)

programme.title: Project Almanac
programme.desc: Following the death of his inventor father, a teenager finds plans for a time-travel device. He and his friends decide to build it, and together they embark on an amazing adventure back in time - but soon discover the perils of altering history. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jonny Weston, Sofia Black-D'Elia and Sam Lerner.(n)

programme.title: Maggie
programme.desc: A virus sweeps across America turning people into zombies, and the government establishes measures to capture those infected and dispose of them once the process is complete. When a teenage girl is infected, her devoted father refuses to hand her over to the authorities, and vows to defend her to the bitter end. Horror, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger and Abigail Breslin.(n)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: Fugitive Riddick evades capture by bounty hunters and steals their spacecraft, only to run into an even bigger threat - fanatical cult members on a sinister mission to kill or convert anyone who crosses their path as they seek galactic domination. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Vin Diesel reprising his role from Pitch Black alongside Judi Dench, Alexa Davalos and Thandie Newton.(n)

programme.title: Army of Darkness
programme.desc: Zombie-battling hero Ash is transported back in time to the medieval era. In an attempt to find a way back to his own time, he accidentally summons up a horde of living skeletons led by his own evil double and must fight to send them back to the grave. Comedy fantasy adventure sequel to The Evil Dead, starring Bruce Campbell and Embeth Davidtz.(n)

programme.title: Exists
programme.desc: After venturing into the remote Texas woods for a party weekend, five friends are terrorised by a legendary monster. Horror from the director of The Blair Witch Project, starring Samuel Davis, Dora Madison, Roger Edwards and Chris Osborn.(n)

programme.title: Project Almanac
programme.desc: Following the death of his inventor father, a teenager finds plans for a time-travel device. He and his friends decide to build it, and together they embark on an amazing adventure back in time - but soon discover the perils of altering history. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jonny Weston, Sofia Black-D'Elia and Sam Lerner.(n)

programme.title: Maggie
programme.desc: A virus sweeps across America turning people into zombies, and the government establishes measures to capture those infected and dispose of them once the process is complete. When a teenage girl is infected, her devoted father refuses to hand her over to the authorities, and vows to defend her to the bitter end. Horror, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger and Abigail Breslin.(n)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: Fugitive Riddick evades capture by bounty hunters and steals their spacecraft, only to run into an even bigger threat - fanatical cult members on a sinister mission to kill or convert anyone who crosses their path as they seek galactic domination. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Vin Diesel reprising his role from Pitch Black alongside Judi Dench, Alexa Davalos and Thandie Newton.(n)

programme.title: Army of Darkness
programme.desc: Zombie-battling hero Ash is transported back in time to the medieval era. In an attempt to find a way back to his own time, he accidentally summons up a horde of living skeletons led by his own evil double and must fight to send them back to the grave. Comedy fantasy adventure sequel to The Evil Dead, starring Bruce Campbell and Embeth Davidtz.(n)

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: Outlaws hold staff and a passenger and her baby hostage at a remote stagecoach station while awaiting the arrival of a shipment of $100,000 in gold bullion. The nervous captives try to stay calm, but the tension between the gang leader and a jumpy henchman grows fraught, ending in a frantic shoot-out - with the infant in the thick of the fray. Western, starring Tyrone Power, Susan Hayward and Jack Elam.(n)

programme.title: Play Misty for Me
programme.desc: A DJ has a one-night stand with an obsessive woman who repeatedly calls his station with the same song request. When he revives his relationship with an old flame, his unstable fan is driven mad with jealousy. Psychological thriller, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood, with Jessica Walter, Donna Mills, John Larch and James McEachin.(n)

programme.title: The Salvation
programme.desc: A Danish settler in the Wild West is joined by his wife and son, but they are soon murdered. He avenges their deaths, but his actions attract the wrath of a ruthless gang leader. Abandoned by his friends and neighbours, the peaceful pioneer is forced to stand alone to enforce the law in his new home. Western, starring Mads Mikkelsen and Eva Green.(n)

programme.title: The Hustler
programme.desc: An arrogant pool shark challenges a renowned champion player, only to lose the match and end up broke with his confidence shattered. With the aid of a cut-throat manager, he sets about honing his skills for a rematch - but making it to the top could cost him everything. Oscar-winning drama, starring Paul Newman, Jackie Gleason, George C Scott, Piper Laurie, Murray Hamilton and Myron McCormick.(n)

programme.title: As Good as It Gets
programme.desc: A bigoted misanthropic writer, who treats everyone he meets with contempt, is forced to look after a gay neighbour's dog, and develops an empathy with another creature for the first time in years. Sensing a need for human company, he pursues an unlikely romance with a waitress, who is the only person willing to put up with his rudeness. Romantic comedy drama, with Jack Nicholson, Helen Hunt, Cuba Gooding Jr and Greg Kinnear.(n)

programme.title: Love & Mercy
programme.desc: Biopic of the Beach Boys' Brian Wilson, following the singer-songwriter at two periods in his life. In the 1960s, he is at his creative peak, but haunted by inner demons that take their toll on his mental health. By the 1980s, he is a broken man dominated by a shady doctor, until a new relationship offers him a chance at recovery. Starring John Cusack, Paul Dano, Paul Giamatti and Elizabeth Banks.(n)

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The patriarch of the Corleone crime family is hospitalised after an attempt on his life and entrusts control of his business to his three sons - the violent and unpredictable Sonny, the weak-willed Fredo, and Michael, the youngest brother, who reluctantly takes up the reins but proves to be the most ruthless of them all. Francis Ford Coppola's gangster drama, starring Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, John Cazale, Talia Shire, Robert Duvall and Diane Keaton.(n)

programme.title: The Godfather: Part II
programme.desc: Mafia don Michael Corleone sets out to clinch a make-or-break deal with an ageing gangster - but his plans are blown apart by a traitor within the family. Michael's story is intercut with flashback sequences chronicling the early life of his father Vito, as he makes the shift from immigrant grocery-store clerk to Mob kingpin. Francis Ford Coppola's Oscar-winning crime drama sequel, with Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, John Cazale, Michael V Gazzo and Lee Strasberg.(n)

programme.title: The Godfather: Part III
programme.desc: Twenty years after ordering the murder of his brother, ageing don Michael Corleone is close to fulfilling his dream of severing his family's Mafia ties and gaining legitimacy, but vengeful enemies and the actions of his hot-headed nephew soon draw him back into a life of crime. Conclusion of Francis Ford Coppola's crime drama trilogy, starring Al Pacino, Andy Garcia, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, Eli Wallach, Bridget Fonda and Joe Mantegna.(n)

programme.title: Partisan
programme.desc: A young boy raised to be an assassin starts to question the ways of his community's charismatic and domineering leader. Drama, with Vincent Cassel, Jeremy Chabriel and Florence Mezzara.(n)

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: Outlaws hold staff and a passenger and her baby hostage at a remote stagecoach station while awaiting the arrival of a shipment of $100,000 in gold bullion. The nervous captives try to stay calm, but the tension between the gang leader and a jumpy henchman grows fraught, ending in a frantic shoot-out - with the infant in the thick of the fray. Western, starring Tyrone Power, Susan Hayward and Jack Elam.(n)

programme.title: Hell Is for Heroes
programme.desc: A rebellious soldier defies orders to lead two men on a secret attack on a German pillbox, but his mission fails and the other two soldiers are killed. Court-martialled for his actions, he remains convinced his plan was sound and ignores the sentence to make a second attempt at destroying the emplacement. Second World War adventure, with Steve McQueen, James Coburn and Bobby Darin.(n)

programme.title: National Lampoon's Animal House
programme.desc: A college's most slobbish and unruly student fraternity faces expulsion for upsetting the rigid social order of the campus, so its madcap members plan one final act of rebellion against the college dean and a preppy bunch of snobbish bullies at the annual university homecoming parade. Comedy, starring John Belushi, Tim Matheson, Donald Sutherland, Karen Allen and Tom Hulce.(n)

programme.title: Cool Hand Luke
programme.desc: A rebellious small-time crook is sent to a prison in the Deep South, where he becomes a hero in the eyes of his fellow convicts and a thorn in the sides of the warden and the guards by refusing to bow to authority. His defiance escalates when he receives news of his mother's death, and embarks on a series of failed escape attempts. Drama based on Donn Pearce's novel, starring Paul Newman, George Kennedy, JD Cannon and Dennis Hopper.(n)

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: A veteran CIA agent is on the verge of retirement, but when he learns his former protege has been thrown into a Chinese prison and is awaiting execution, he decides to launch a perilous and ill-advised rescue attempt. Thriller, starring Brad Pitt, Robert Redford, Catherine McCormack and Stephen Dillane.(n)

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The patriarch of the Corleone crime family is hospitalised after an attempt on his life and entrusts control of his business to his three sons - the violent and unpredictable Sonny, the weak-willed Fredo, and Michael, the youngest brother, who reluctantly takes up the reins but proves to be the most ruthless of them all. Francis Ford Coppola's gangster drama, starring Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, John Cazale, Talia Shire, Robert Duvall and Diane Keaton.(n)

programme.title: The Godfather: Part II
programme.desc: Mafia don Michael Corleone sets out to clinch a make-or-break deal with an ageing gangster - but his plans are blown apart by a traitor within the family. Michael's story is intercut with flashback sequences chronicling the early life of his father Vito, as he makes the shift from immigrant grocery-store clerk to Mob kingpin. Francis Ford Coppola's Oscar-winning crime drama sequel, with Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, John Cazale, Michael V Gazzo and Lee Strasberg.(n)

programme.title: The Godfather: Part III
programme.desc: Twenty years after ordering the murder of his brother, ageing don Michael Corleone is close to fulfilling his dream of severing his family's Mafia ties and gaining legitimacy, but vengeful enemies and the actions of his hot-headed nephew soon draw him back into a life of crime. Conclusion of Francis Ford Coppola's crime drama trilogy, starring Al Pacino, Andy Garcia, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, Eli Wallach, Bridget Fonda and Joe Mantegna.(n)

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: A professor invents a ray with the power to reduce objects in size. Unfortunately, his kids and their meddling friends activate it and are shrunk to microscopic proportions. When they are accidentally thrown out with the rubbish, the children have to contend with all kinds of animals and insects on their journey home across the backyard. Disney comedy, with Rick Moranis, Marcia Strassman and Amy O'Neill.(n)

programme.title: Ice Age: Continental Drift
programme.desc: A cataclysm leaves prehistoric animals Manny, Sid and Diego lost at sea on a drifting iceberg. They try to find a way to return home, embarking on a journey that leads to an encounter with a ferocious band of piratical creatures. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary and Peter Dinklage.(n)

programme.title: Rio
programme.desc: A domesticated rare bird is taken to Rio de Janeiro to mate with a female, but the pair are stolen by animal smugglers. He ends up lost on the streets of a strange city, and to make it back to his owner, he will have to learn to fly for the first time in his life. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jesse Eisenberg and Anne Hathaway.(n)

programme.title: Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: A minor-league ice hockey player is nicknamed the Tooth Fairy for knocking opponents' teeth out on the ice. When the cynical athlete discourages a young fan, he is forced to pay penance by spending a week as the real Tooth Fairy, rediscovering his dreams in the process. Family comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Ashley Judd, Stephen Merchant, Ryan Sheckler and Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: GI Joe: The Rise of Cobra
programme.desc: When a powerful experimental weapon is snatched by a mysterious terrorist organisation, two of the soldiers guarding it are recruited into a top-secret military strike force. As they go in search of the stolen technology, they uncover a plot by its creator to take over the world. Action adventure, with Channing Tatum, Sienna Miller and Christopher Eccleston.(n)

programme.title: X-Men: First Class
programme.desc: Telepathic mutant Charles Xavier forms the first generation of the superhero team in the 1960s. Their battle with a Nazi war criminal manipulating the world toward nuclear war gradually drives a wedge between Xavier and his ally Magneto, leading them to become deadly enemies. Superhero adventure prequel, starring James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender and Jennifer Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Insidious
programme.desc: A family experience strange events in their house and become convinced it is haunted. However, after moving on, they find the dark forces have followed them and when their son mysteriously falls into a coma, they must find a way to get rid of the paranormal entities tormenting them. Horror, starring Patrick Wilson and Rose Byrne.(n)

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: A couple previously tormented by paranormal activity discover their nightmares are not over. As more strange events occur, they turn to a group of paranormal investigators for help in uncovering the dark secrets that connect them to the spirit world. Horror sequel, starring Patrick Wilson, Rose Byrne and Barbara Hershey.(n)

programme.title: Horton Hears a Who
programme.desc: A kindly elephant hears a cry of help coming from a speck of dust and discovers the minuscule city of Whoville. As he tries to help its citizens, the other animals begin to question his sanity, and the evil Kangaroo incites them to turn against the do-gooder. Animated adaptation of Dr Seuss's book, with the voices of Jim Carrey, Steve Carell, Carol Burnett, Seth Rogen and Will Arnett.(n)

programme.title: Bridge to Terabithia
programme.desc: Twelve-year-old Jess befriends a new girl at school, and the pair begin to create their own imaginary kingdom in a secret place in the woods to escape the difficulties of their real lives. Unfortunately, a tragedy threatens to bring their fantasy world to an end. Drama based on Katherine Paterson's novel, starring Josh Hutcherson, AnnaSophia Robb, Zooey Deschanel and Robert Patrick.(n)

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A bumbling secret agent retires to a Tibetan monastery in disgrace after a mission goes wrong. He is lured out of seclusion by the chance to redeem himself when his former bosses seek his help in foiling an attempt to assassinate the premier of China. Spy comedy sequel, starring Rowan Atkinson, Gillian Anderson, Rosamund Pike and Dominic West.(n)

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian
programme.desc: The living exhibits at New York's Museum of Natural History are shipped to Washington's Smithsonian Institution - along with the artefact that brought them to life in the first place. Nightwatchman Larry tries to retrieve it, only to find the contents of the world's largest museum have been reanimated, including a pharaoh determined to take over the world. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller, Amy Adams, Owen Wilson and Steve Coogan.(n)

programme.title: Grease 2
programme.desc: A shy English boy joins the senior class at Rydell High and immediately falls for the leader of the Pink Ladies. But she is only interested in tough guys, forcing him to adopt a dual identity as a mysterious biker. Musical sequel, starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Maxwell Caulfield, Lorna Luft, Eve Arden and Sid Caesar, with Didi Conn reprising her role as Frenchy from the original film.(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: The leaders of a secret government agency plan to eliminate several agents as part of a cover-up when they face having their dark secrets exposed. One of the assassins targeted is able to evade his fate and go on the run - but his escape is threatened by his dependence on drugs to boost his physical and mental capabilities. Spy thriller sequel, with Jeremy Renner, Rachel Weisz and Edward Norton.(n)

programme.title: Priest
programme.desc: In the future, the world has been devastated by a war between humans and vampires, leaving an enclave of survivors living under the domination of a religious hierarchy. A war veteran-turned-priest breaks his vows and sets off in search of his niece, who has been kidnapped by undead villains. Fantasy action thriller, with Paul Bettany, Karl Urban and Maggie Q.(n)

programme.title: One Woman's Courage
programme.desc: A woman is driven to drink by her husband's infidelity, and witnesses an assault. Initially reluctant to testify in court, she is finally persuaded by the victim's mother, but the trial results in her secrets being exposed and the defendant begins stalking her. Drama, starring Patty Duke, Margot Kidder and James Farentino.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Fine Things
programme.desc: A man marries the woman of his dreams, only to see her die of cancer - and while coping with the pain of bereavement, he finds himself subjected to extortionate demands from her drug-dealing ex-husband. Drama, starring DW Moffett, Tracy Pollan and Cloris Leachman.(n)

programme.title: Another Life
programme.desc: Fact-based period drama loosely based on the well-publicised murder of Percy Thompson during the 1920s. Starring Natasha Little, Nick Moran, Ioan Gruffudd and Imelda Staunton.(n)

programme.title: Sharing the Secret
programme.desc: A teenager struggles with bulimia, while her psychologist mother deals with her guilt at not recognising the signs of an eating disorder. Drama, starring Alison Lohman, Mare Winningham and Roxana Brusso.(n)

programme.title: A Child's Wish
programme.desc: A distressed man takes time off work to help look after his cancer-stricken daughter, only to be fired by his uncaring boss, prompting the start of a long legal battle which even attracts the President's attention. Fact-based drama, starring John Ritter, Tess Harper, Anna Chlumsky and Bill Clinton as himself.(n)

programme.title: Those She Left Behind
programme.desc: Affluent expectant parents Scott and Sue Grimes look forward to starting the next stage of their lives with the arrival of their first child. However, when Sue unexpectedly dies in childbirth, Scott is forced to navigate the difficulties of raising his new daughter alone, and must summon the fortitude to tackle life as a single parent. Drama, starring Gary Cole and Mary Page Keller.(n)

programme.title: The Babysitter's Seduction
programme.desc: When the wife of her wealthy employer is found dead, unsuspecting babysitter Michelle is drawn into a sinister plot and finds herself being accused of murder by a determined detective. Thriller, starring Keri Russell, Stephen Collins, Phylicia Rashad and Tobin Bell.(n)

programme.title: Family Rescue
programme.desc: A teenager is raped and becomes pregnant by her mother's boyfriend - but to her horror, the court grants him custody of the child. Drama, starring George C Scott, Rachael Leigh Cook, Dom Diamont and Ally Sheedy.(n)

programme.title: Fatal Vows: The Alexandra O'Hara Story
programme.desc: A woman realises her new husband may be a serial rapist and murderer, and tries to provide the police with evidence of his guilt without becoming his next victim. Fact-based thriller, starring Cynthia Gibb and John Stamos.(n)

programme.title: Child of Rage
programme.desc: A priest and his wife adopt seven-year-old Catherine and her brother Eric, but quickly realise the girl's troubled past has left her suffering from violent behavioural problems. Drama, starring Mel Harris, Dwight Schultz and Ashley Peldon.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Corabeth finds a love letter in Ike's belongings and decides to file for divorce.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Rose's wedding is nearly cancelled when she discovers that she has a heart condition. Meanwhile, Cindy gets a job, but decides she wants to be a stay-at-home mother.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Amorous Walnut Grove newcomer Adam Simms falls in love with Miss Beadle, while his son Luke proves he's a chip off the old block by persuading Nellie Oleson to run away with him.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A Native American boy arrives in Walnut Grove seeking medical help for his desperately ill father, but faces racial hatred from the townsfolk. Drama, starring Michael Landon.(n)

programme.title: Borrowed Hearts
programme.desc: A ruthless factory boss pays a hard-up employee to pose as his wife, hoping to impress a mysterious colleague - an arrangement with unexpected consequences for all concerned. Romantic drama, starring Roma Downey, Eric McCormack and Shawn Thompson.(n)

programme.title: A Hobo's Christmas
programme.desc: A dishevelled down-and-out who returns home to visit the family he deserted many years before, but his shunned son is not pleased by his sudden reappearance. Drama, starring Gerald McRaney, Barnard Hughes, Wendy Crewson and William Hickey.(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Visitor
programme.desc: A couple have not celebrated Christmas for 11 years, ever since the death of their son in the first Gulf War. However, their spiritual faith is restored when they are visited by a mysterious stranger who is the same age their boy would have been, had he survived. Drama, starring Reagan Pasternak, Aaron Ashmore, Meredith Baxter and William Devane.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Box
programme.desc: A hard-working man's obsession with his business causes him to neglect his family - but a series of strange dreams makes him realise it is the most important thing in his life. Drama, starring Richard Thomas and Maureen O'Hara.(n)

programme.title: A Grandpa for Christmas
programme.desc: An elderly actor who is happiest with his own company unexpectedly ends up having to care for his grand-daughter over Christmas when her mother is hospitalised in a car crash. Although the pair find it hard to get along at first, they eventually bond while working on a school pageant. Family comedy, starring Ernest Borgnine, Juliette Goglia and Katherine Helmond.(n)

programme.title: Ebbie
programme.desc: A high-flying but mean-hearted female department store executive is brought back down to earth with a bump by three spooks determined to put a smile on her face in preparation for the Christmas season's celebrations. Festive drama based on the Dickens' tale, starring Susan Lucci, Wendy Crewson, Ron Lea, Jeffrey DeMunn and Molly Parker.(n)

programme.title: A Wind at My Back Christmas
programme.desc: Family members struggling to survive in Depression-era Ontario have their lives touched by the impending war in Europe when an unexpected visitor arrives. This seasonal drama is a spin-off from a hugely popular Canadian TV series, and stars Dylan Provencher, Tyrone Savage and James Carroll.(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Visitor
programme.desc: A couple have not celebrated Christmas for 11 years, ever since the death of their son in the first Gulf War. However, their spiritual faith is restored when they are visited by a mysterious stranger who is the same age their boy would have been, had he survived. Drama, starring Reagan Pasternak, Aaron Ashmore, Meredith Baxter and William Devane.(n)

programme.title: Angel in the Family
programme.desc: A widower reaches out to his estranged daughters after suffering a stroke and asks them to spend Christmas with him. Despite their misgivings, the warring sisters return home to be with him and experience a miracle when their late mother returns to life. Fantasy, starring Meredith Baxter, Tracey Needham, Natasha Gregson Wagner and Ronny Cox.(n)

programme.title: The Pursuit of DB Cooper
programme.desc: Fact-based thriller about an audacious crook who held a passenger plane to ransom and escaped with more than $200,000 by parachuting to an unknown destination somewhere near Washington. Starring Treat Williams, Robert Duvall, Paul Gleason and Kathryn Harrold.(n)

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Tess trains an apprentice angel to guide and inspire those who need love. Heavenly drama, starring Roma Downey and Della Reese.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The newspaper where John-Boy works closes down, but the owner offers to sell him a printing press so he can publish one of his own. However, raising the money proves difficult.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy is approached by an old flame, who wants him to come with her to Spain and report on the Civil War.(n)

programme.title: Search for Justice
programme.desc: A bereaved woman faces a desperate struggle to overcome official indifference and prove her daughter was murdered. Drama, starring Peggy Lipton, Danica McKellar and Bruce Weitz.(n)

programme.title: Taming Andrew
programme.desc: A mother is distraught when her son is abducted and spends the next five years searching for him, only to suffer more pain when they are finally reunited and she discovers the emotional trauma he has endured. Fact-based drama, starring Park Overall, Jason Beghe and Seth Adkins.(n)

programme.title: Runaway Father
programme.desc: A woman who has been living in poverty for 20 years following her husband's death learns that he is still alive, having faked his demise so he could abandon his family. She resolves to track him down and force him to accept his responsibilities. Fact-based drama, starring Donna Mills and Jack Scalia.(n)

programme.desc: A small-town lawyer running for congress is blackmailed into defending a man accused of murder - and to make matters worse, his wife is harbouring a shocking secret. Thriller, starring Louis Gossett Jr, Robert Urich and Lonette McKee.(n)

programme.title: In Defense of Kids
programme.desc: An encounter with a young runaway leads a lawyer to devote her career to representing abused and neglected youngsters. Drama, starring Blythe Danner and Sam Waterston.(n)

programme.title: Untamed Love
programme.desc: A teacher who specialises in tutoring children with learning difficulties forms a close bond with a violent girl traumatised by years of physical and psychological abuse. Fact-based drama, starring Cathy Lee Crosby, Ashlee Lauren, John Getz and Richard Fancy.(n)

programme.title: Too Young to Be a Father
programme.desc: A 15-year-old boy is stunned to discover his girlfriend is pregnant, but resolves to get through the tough trials ahead with the help of his family and friends. When the girl's parents decide to put the baby up for adoption, he vows to fight the decision. Drama, starring Paul Dano, Kathy Baker and Bruce Davison.(n)

programme.title: Hearts Adrift
programme.desc: A mother and daughter's humdrum small-town life is radically changed by a trip to spend a weekend with a family friend in the country. Romantic drama, starring Sydney Penny, Scott Reeves, Kathleen Noone and Nicolas Coster.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: A TV star who plays a kindly family man is a cruel bully in real life, but Jonathan tries to make him change his ways. Ned Beatty guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan meets another angel, who tries to sabotage his latest mission when it involves his human life.(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt tries to persuade an old friend who has turned to drink to mend his ways.(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Dodge City is rocked by a series of apparently random murders, and Matt fears that Doc may be the next target.(n)

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: The heavenly helpers are assigned to a doctor whose husband is having an affair. American drama, Roma Downey and Della Reese star.(n)

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Part two of two. Tess returns home to inform Josh's family that he has been shot and needs their support. Roma Downey and Della Reese star.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part one of two. John-Boy receives an offer from a publishing house just as the house is nearly destroyed in a fire - and his manuscript is lost in the blaze.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part two of two. The Walton children are sent to live with different families while their house is rebuilt.(n)

programme.title: Complex of Fear
programme.desc: A rookie cop is assigned the tough case of tracking down a killer wreaking havoc among the residents of a housing development - and all the clues point to one of his friends. Thriller, starring Joe Don Baker, Hart Bochner and Chelsea Field.(n)

programme.title: Stolen Innocence
programme.desc: An unhappy, emotionally vulnerable teenager runs away from home and falls for a charismatic ex-convict, joining him as he travels the country on a crime spree. However, her psychopathic companion ultimately takes her hostage, so he can demand a ransom from her parents. Drama, starring Tracey Gold, Thomas Calabro, Bess Armstrong and Nick Searcy.(n)

programme.title: Fatal Vows: The Alexandra O'Hara Story
programme.desc: A woman realises her new husband may be a serial rapist and murderer, and tries to provide the police with evidence of his guilt without becoming his next victim. Fact-based thriller, starring Cynthia Gibb and John Stamos.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Emily thinks her lost love has come back to her, only to discover it is his son, who is more interested in Erin. Guest starring Jonathan Frakes (Star Trek: The Next Generation).(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mary gives Laura a baby raccoon as a pet, but it bites both her and the family dog, leaving Charles worried it may have rabies.(n)

programme.title: Presumed Guilty
programme.desc: A teenager is wrongly convicted of murder, prompting his father to set about getting him off the hook. Fact-based drama, starring Martin Sheen, Brendan Fraser, Caroline Kava and Mark Metcalf.(n)

programme.title: Escape from Terror: The Teresa Stamper Story
programme.desc: A woman falls in love with the man she believes is Mr Right and hastily marries him, but it isn't long before he begins showing his true colours, forcing her to seek shelter at a safe house. Fact-based drama, starring Maria Pitillo, Adam Storke and Brad Dourif.(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Romance
programme.desc: A selfish banker visits a single mother with the intention of repossessing her house, but his plans go awry as a snowstorm forces him to stay there and romance begins to blossom. Family drama, starring Olivia Newton-John and Gregory Harrison.(n)

programme.title: The Glass House
programme.desc: A former college professor launches a campaign for prison reforms while serving time in a harsh maximum security jail for manslaughter. Drama based on a short story by Truman Capote, starring Alan Alda, Vic Morrow, Dean Jagger and Billy Dee Williams.(n)

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton(n)

programme.title: The Corporate Gig
programme.desc: The Staton-House Band's first-ever corporate gig sets the crew loose at a beachfront resort in San Diego, as several relationships take unexpected turns(n)

programme.title: Goodbye Beautiful
programme.desc: When the head of the Russian mob arrives to find out what really happened to Belikov, Sonia and her daughter take refuge at the Donovan's, throwing her and Abby into close quarters. As both Avi and Lena question Ray's loyalty to Sonia, he must decide whether to help her or put the lives of his family and friends in jeopardy. Meanwhile, Mickey returns to Primm - in search of stolen money, Sylvie and vengeance(n)

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: Writer and director Quentin Tarantino reinvigorated the noir crime drama with this wildly entertaining blockbuster that casts John Travolta and Samuel L. Jackson as hit-man partners whose meandering paths cross those of a powerful gangster (Ving Rhames), the latter's overdosing girlfriend (Uma Thurman), a desperate boxer (Bruce Willis) and a pair of stickup artists named Honeybunny (Amanda Plummer) and Pumpkin (Tim Roth). "Leaves viewers both exhilarated and exhausted - hearts racing and knuckles white from the ride." -Amazon.com(n)

programme.title: Miles To Go Before I Sleep
programme.desc: Short documentary chronicling the true story of famed musicians and the relationships they have with their roadies. Features music legends Chad Smith (Red Hot Chili Peppers), Chris Shiflett (Foo Fighters) and Jim James (My Morning Jacket), who speak candidly about their time on the road and the importance of the crew who work tirelessly to put the show together, as well as capturing a day behind-the-scenes with the crew of Pearl Jam(n)

programme.title: Mississippi Burning
programme.desc: Gene Hackman and Willem Dafoe star as FBI agents with wildly different styles who arrive in 1960s Mississippi to investigate the murder of civil rights activists and become embroiled in a dangerous conspiracy of silence(n)

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself(n)

programme.title: Listen To Me Marlon
programme.desc: Documentary that reveals Hollywood legend Marlon Brando entirely in his own words -- through exclusive access to the actor's extraordinary personal archive of unseen film footage and unheard audio recordings, comprising the definitive story of one of the most complex and influential actors of all time(n)

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: A newspaper cartoonist becomes obsessed with solving San Francisco's infamous "Zodiac" serial killer case, and eventually closes in on a suspect after the case has long become cold in this fact-based thriller starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Mark Ruffalo, Robert Downey Jr. and Chloe Sevigny(n)

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Remake of the classic blaxploitation action flick starring Samuel L. Eva Green and Judi Dench costar in this box office blockbuster that relaunches the Bond franchise(n)

Stars Keira Knightley and Mark Ruffalo(n)

programme.desc: Kirsten Dunst stars in this ethereal drama based on the best-selling novel about a family of repressed teenaged girls in the 1970s who take drastic action to escape their restrictive home life. Danny DeVito, Josh Hartnett, Kathleen Turner and James Woods costar in the directorial debut of Sofia Coppola(n)

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: When a cable channel runs a computer boxing simulation that predicts an in-his-prime Rocky Balboa would win a fight against the current heavyweight champion, the aging, retired Balboa - now a widowed Philadelphia restaurant owner - begins considering a very late-career comeback. Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver(n)

Also stars Kerry Washington(n)

programme.title: As I AM: The Life and Times of DJ AM

Includes live sets, plus interviews with Jon Favreau, Mark Ronson, Mix Master Mike, Samantha Ronson and many others(n)

programme.title: The Duff
programme.desc: After finding out that her classmates have been calling her "the Duff" (Designated Ugly Fat Friend) behind her back, a high school senior decides to reinvent herself with the help of a charming jock and in the process overthrow the school's social order(n)

programme.title: Lumberjack Man

Busta Rhymes, Tyra Banks, Ryan Merriman, Thomas Ian Nicholas and Sean Patrick Thomas costar in this freaky follow-up from "Halloween 2" director Rick Rosenthal(n)

programme.title: Jessabelle
programme.desc: Returning to her childhood home in Louisiana to recuperate from a horrific car accident, a young girl comes face to face with a long-tormented spirit that has no intention of letting her escape(n)

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Wilbur
programme.desc: A lonely, stuttering London baker who is still something of a mama's boy despite being his thirties pines for love in this quirky comedy from AFI student Dago Rodriguez(n)

programme.title: Blood Sand

Packed with interviews with those who broke the law and those who protected it, in what turned out to be the biggest police corruption scandal in New York City history(n)

programme.title: Last Knights

programme.title: Underclassman

Disaster movie maven Roland Emmerich (Independence Day, The Day After Tomorrow) crafts this apocalyptic sci-fi thriller following the prophecy stated by the ancient Mayan calendar, which says that the world will come to an end on December 21, 2012. programme.title: Taken 2
programme.desc: His family targeted by a vengeful crime boss in Istanbul, retired CIA agent Bryan Mills (Liam Neeson) must fight an army of killers to ensure their safe return in this action sequel from director Olivier Megaton (Transporter 3) and producer/co-writer Luc Besson (who penned the screenplay alongside Taken scribe Robert Mark Kamen). As the families of the kidnappers killed by Mills gather together for a mass funeral, their leader Merad (Rade Sherbedgia) vows to make the man who brought them so much misery pay. Meanwhile, back in the U.S., Mills invites his ex-wife Lenore (Famke Janssen) and their daughter Kim (Maggie Grace) to join him on a trip to Istanbul after their long-planned trip to China falls through. Later, in Istanbul, the family is settling in and enjoying the sites when Merad's gang abducts Mills and Lenore. Communicating with her father via a hidden cell phone, Kim accesses his secret weapons cache and embarks on a frantic race through an unfamiliar city in a bid to rescue her parents from certain death. Once she manages to free her father, Mills puts his "particular set of skills" to use while attempting to rescue his Lenore, and escape Merad's unrelenting attack(n)

programme.desc: Gripping Holocaust biopic with Adrien Brody as a gifted Polish-Jewish musician struggling to survive in the Warsaw ghetto. Brody dropped about 30 pounds to affect the emaciated look of a starving man. Roman Polanski scored Best Director. As a Jewish youngster in 1939 Krakow, Polanski witnessed the Nazi invasion. It's his first film shot in his native Poland since 1962's "Knife in the Water," his feature-film debut(n)

programme.title: Grilled
programme.desc: A pair of struggling meat salesmen get caught up in a mob war while trying to close an important sale(n)

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: A murdered New York banker returns to protect his girlfriend, with help from a psychic(n)

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Second sequel in the popular animated fantasy franchise. Newlyweds Shrek and Fiona face their first marital hurdle when the sudden death of King Harold means Shrek himself is next in line. However, with fatherhood looming, Shrek is reluctant. He decides to try and find the true heir - Fiona's errant, rebellious cousin. But while Shrek and his faithful companions Donkey and Puss in Boots go off in search of the heir, handsome rogue Prince Charming stages a coup at the castle(n)

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending
programme.desc: In this mind-blowing sci-fi epic in which human beings are the least-evolved species in the known universe, an ex-soldier protects a seemingly ordinary woman who's been targeted for assassination by a ruthless queen(n)

programme.title: Jim: The James Foley Story
programme.desc: Profiling journalist James Foley, who was kidnapped in Syria in 2012 and became the first US citizen to be killed by the terrorist group ISIS. Friends, family and professional colleagues share their recollections of him in this documentary(n)

programme.title: True Story
programme.desc: This psychological thriller, based on true events, tells the story of a disgraced journalist (Jonah Hill) who's drawn into a cat-and-mouse game with an accused murderer (James Franco) who has assumed the journalists' identity(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Blackhat'
programme.desc: A look at "Blackhat," a 2015 thriller about a convict who helps authorities track down a cybercriminal. The film stars Chris Hemsworth, Tang Wei and Viola Davis, and is directed by Michael Mann(n)

programme.title: Remember the Titans
programme.desc: The appointment of black coach Herman Boone to a high school in 70s Virginia causes a stir in the town, where white coach Yoast is well-respected. Boone walks into a minefield of bigotry but his fair-minded approach gradually wins the hearts of his players. Drama(n)

programme.title: Vice
programme.desc: A cop pursues a female android that escaped from a hedonistic resort where people live out their wildest fantasies. Meanwhile, the owner of the resort dispatches a band of mercenaries to eliminate the android first(n)

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: Charter schools in the U.S.; the Ryan Lochte Olympic scandal; and Donald Trump's 2016 presidential campaign are discussed(n)

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.desc: Part 7: Ordinary Death. The defense presents its case in the trial of The State v. Nasir Khan(n)

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: In this installment of the "Vacation" series, the youngest son of the Griswold clan, now grown with a family of his own, sets out to recreate a cross-country road trip from his youth to an amusement park(n)

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending
programme.desc: In this mind-blowing sci-fi epic in which human beings are the least-evolved species in the known universe, an ex-soldier protects a seemingly ordinary woman who's been targeted for assassination by a ruthless queen(n)

programme.title: Blackhat
programme.desc: A furloughed convict teams with a joint American-Chinese anticyber-theft task force to root out a hacker based in Southeast Asia(n)

programme.title: 28 Weeks Later
programme.desc: Six months have passed since the rage virus has annihilated the British Isles. The U.S. Army declares that the war against infection has been won, and that the reconstruction of the country can begin. As the first wave of refugees return, a family is reunited--but one of them unwittingly carries a terrible secret(n)

programme.title: The Fabulous Baker Boys
programme.desc: Real-life siblings Beau and Jeff Bridges star as the eponymous Fabulous Baker Boys. Musical prodigies both, the Bakers have long been teamed as a twin-piano act, with the less talented Frank (Beau Bridges) coasting on the skills of his brilliant younger brother, Jack (Jeff Bridges). Their career dwindling to nickel-and-dime dates in second-rate clubs, the Bakers decide that they need a female vocalist to boost their popularity. They select auditioner Susie Diamond (Michelle Pfeiffer), who in addition to being a gifted songstress is drop-dead gorgeous. The newly renovated Baker Boys act scores a success, which is inevitably threatened by Susie's growing popularity and by Jack's insistence upon pursuing an affair with the girl(n)

programme.title: The Birdcage
programme.desc: Amusing comedy about a gay couple forced to pretend they are straight when the son of one of them brings his future parents-in-law for a visit. The flamboyant owner of a Miami nightclub and his drag-queen partner attempt to tone down their extravagant lifestyle before the ultra- conservative Senator and his wife arrive, with hilarious consequences(n)

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: If you live in a city of reasonable size, you've almost certainly seen them -- the shabby men and women who spend their days collecting cans and bottles they've rescued from trash barrels, alleys, sidewalks, or anywhere people gather, making pocket money by turning them in for the refund deposits, usually five or ten cents per container. In New York City, these people are known as "canners," and while they're a common sight, in a real sense they're also invisible, a segment of the economic underclass most folks prefer not to acknowledge. Filmmakers Jon Alpert and Matthew O'Neill introduce us to a handful of New York City "canners" and looks into the lives of people struggling to get by through other people's discards in the documentary Redemption. Redemption received a 2013 Academy Award nomination for Best Documentary Short Subject(n)

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: A nerdy teen falls for the enigmatic girl next door, who vanishes after the two have an adventure together one night. She leaves behind a trail of clues, which lead him and his pals to go on a road trip to find her(n)

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, the Barden Bellas a cappella group enter an international competition, but are told it will be impossible to win because they are from the U.S. The ladies vow to be the first Americans to take home the top prize(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Pitch Perfect 2'
programme.desc: A look at "Pitch Perfect 2," a 2015 musical comedy about a collegiate a cappella group that enters an international competition no U.S. team has ever won. The sequel to the 2012 film stars Anna Kendrick, Skylar Astin and Rebel Wilson, and is directed by Elizabeth Banks(n)

programme.title: 27 Dresses
programme.desc: Jane is idealistic, romantic and completely selfless--a perennial bridesmaid whose own happy ending is nowhere in sight. But when younger sister Tess captures the heart of Jane's boss--with whom she is secretly in love--Jane begins to reexamine her always-a-bridesmaid... lifestyle(n)

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
programme.desc: In this smart, satrical comedy, a female political consultant is hired to work on the campaign of a Bolivian presidential candidate who has fallen behind in the polls. She faces off against her rival, who is working on the opponent's campaign and is looking for every opportunity to antagonize her(n)

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: In this amusing fish-out-of-water workplace comedy, a 70-year-old widower comes out of retirement to take an internship at a trendy start-up fashion company. Later, he unexpectedly becomes a confidant for the overwhelmed young CEO(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Ripping, fact-based profile in chutzpah about the U.S. congressman who, in the 1980s, used his influence to supply Afghan fighters with money and arms in their battle against Soviet occupiers(n)

programme.title: Becoming Mike Nichols
programme.desc: A compilation of discussions between director Mike Nichols (1931-2014) and his colleague Jack O'Brien includes the former's recollections of his early career in show business, including his comedy performances with Elaine May in the late 1950s; stage directions of "Barefoot in the Park" (1963) and "The Odd Couple" (1965); and making the films "Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?" (1966) and "The Graduate" (1967). The interviews were filmed at the Golden Theatre in New York City in July 2014(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn
programme.desc: A meek young woman emigrates from Ireland to New York City in the 1950s, and finds her heart torn between a magnetic Italian suitor and a charming lad back home(n)

programme.title: Kissing Jessica Stein
programme.desc: Jessica is a straight, neurotic New York journalist who's tired of being single. Her best friend's pregnant, her brother's engaged, and all the guys she meets are losers. So, on a whim, she answers a personal ad - from the women-seeking-women section, placed by Helen, a stylish art gallery owner who's also straight. Over drinks, the two discover a mutual attraction, and decide to start a romantic relationship(n)

programme.title: Saving Grace
programme.desc: Newly-widowed Brenda Blethyn has a problem, namely, debts of £300,000. The solution, in this modern Ealing comedy, is a greenhouse full of marijuana plants. The pot plants are a big hit in Cornwall, but French drugs baron Tchéky Karyo has other ideas(n)

programme.title: The Great Outdoors
programme.desc: Comedy in which a quiet family holiday by the lake is interrupted when the wife's obnoxious salesman brother, his chain-smoking wife and their loathsome twin daughters appear on the cabin doorstep expecting to share the vacation(n)

programme.title: Cry-Baby
programme.desc: John Waters does a quirky spin on '50s nostalgia in Cry-Baby, his musical homage to Rebel Without a Cause and +Romeo and Juliet. Set in Baltimore in 1954 at the birth of rock & roll, the film features Johnny Depp as Wade "Cry-Baby" Walker. Depp is pure charisma as a juvenile delinquent with a permanent tear slithering down his cheek, a reminder of his state-executed parents. In the depths of his despair appears goody-goody girl Allison (Amy Locane), who has a sexual crush on Cry-Baby. But Allison's Pat Boone-like boyfriend, Baldwin (Stephen E. Miller), the leader of the squares, is dead set against Cry-Baby and the rest of the juvenile delinquents and leads a revolt against them. In the resultant riot, the juvenile delinquents are blamed for the chaos, and Cry-Baby finds himself dispatched to reform school(n)

programme.title: Saving Silverman
programme.desc: Two dim-witted former high school buddys, Wayne & J.D., plot to keep their friend Darren from marrying the wrong woman, a domineering and spiteful psychologist(n)

programme.title: Kung Pow: Enter the Fist
programme.desc: The Chosen One was orphaned at birth by villainous Master Pain. Fully grown (he was raised by rodents), he stalks the Earth in search of his enemy for one last karate showdown. Martial arts spoof inserting comedy dubbing over a cheesy 70s Hong Kong fight flick(n)

programme.desc: An A-list actor and his posse of best buds navigate the perils and pleasures of Hollywood life(n)

programme.desc: Rachel is sent to stay with her grandmother after causing trouble for her mum and stepdad(n)

programme.title: Zero Effect
programme.desc: This cleverly constructed detective thriller stars Bill Pullman as Daryl Zero, a man whose eccentric and reclusive nature does not stop him functioning as one of the best detectives in the business. Hired to discover who is behind a blackmailing operation, Zero's investigation becomes too thorough for his client's liking, revealing a trail of lies and deception that leads to.well, that would be telling. The intricate plot is packed with surprises and the richly realised characters will keep you engrossed(n)

programme.title: Beauty Shop
programme.desc: In this razor-sharp comedy, Queen Latifah is a shear delight as she reprises her "Barbershop 2: Back in Business" role as sassy hairstylist Gina Norris. Gina has relocated to Atlanta and has opened her own salon, which houses a zany staff and welcomes a wacky assortment of clients. Djimon Hounsou generates romantic sparks as an electrician hoping to become the new man in Gina's life. Alfre Woodard, Alicia Silverstone, Kevin Bacon, Keshia Knight Pulliam, Andie MacDowell, Della Reese, Paige Hurd(n)

programme.title: Super Troopers
programme.desc: Comedy with some not-so-serious state troopers trying to straighten up and save their jobs after the town's budget cut(n)

programme.desc: A small-town teen's singing video goes viral and catapults her and her sister's band into global super stardom, but their newfound fame threatens to break apart their familial bonds in this spirited adapted musical fantasy(n)

programme.desc: Tom Selleck as a mystery novelist pleasantly perplexed by an attractive murder suspect(n)

programme.title: Out on a Limb
programme.desc: A man trying to help out his sister finds himself chin-deep in hot water in this screwball comedy. Yuppie businessman Bill Campbell (Matthew Broderick) is close to sealing a $140 million business deal when he gets a phone call from his little sister Marci (Courtney Peldon), who is convinced that her new stepfather, Peter Van Der Haven (Jeffrey Jones), the mayor of the city of Buzzsaw, California, is up to no good. Though understandably wary, Bill heads to Buzzsaw, where he promptly loses his paperwork on the deal in progress and is confronted by the city's remarkable collection of eccentrics, including the crazed fugitive Sally (Heidi Kling), the subnormal Jim Jr. and Jim Sr. (John C. Reilly and Michael Monks), and Ann (Marian Mercer), the mayor's loopy wife. It turns out that Marci wasn't entirely wrong; year's ago, Peter's diabolical twin brother Matt (also played by Jones) was sent to jail in his brother's place on criminal charges, and now Matt has violent revenge on his mind. Out on a Limb features an original score by noted composer and arranger Van Dyke Parks(n)

programme.title: Play It to the Bone
programme.desc: Two fighters who never made it to the championships receive one final chance at glory in this boxing road movie. But their purse requires them to be ready to rumble in Vegas in less than five hours(n)

programme.title: The Last Mimzy
programme.desc: Chris O'Neil and Rhiannon Leigh Wryn star as siblings Noah and Emma Wilder in Bob Shaye's intelligent family sci-fi adventure drama that doesn't talk down to children. While staying at their family beach house near Seattle, the two find a box of things that look like toys, but prove to be far more mysterious. Sent back in time, the 'toys' are trying to pass on a message about the future. And the more Noah and Emma play with the objects from the box, the more their intelligence grows. But one day Noah lines up the toys and accidentally activates a powerful force that creates a state-wide blackout. With her family under arrest by the FBI, Emma must make sense of the messages Mimzy, the toy rabbit, has been telepathically communicating to her(n)

But soon the magic gourd begins to drive the lad out of his gourd. Gigi Leung, Peisi Chen. Directed by John Chu and Frankie Chung, and written by Chu and Lam Kee To, who adapted the popular 1958 kids' book by Zhang Tianyi(n)
