programme.desc: The Emperor's New Clothes. Hans Christian Andersen's "The Emperor's New Clothes," about a monarch and his cowed subjects, is dressed up Asian-style. Voices: George Takei, Brian Tochi, Gedde Watanabe and John Wesley(n)

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales for Every Child
programme.desc: Rumpelstiltskin. Robert Townsend adds a Jamaican accent to this yarn about "Rumpelstiltskin"---who spins straw into gold, mon. Other voices include Denzel Washington, Jasmine Guy, Roscoe Lee Browne and Sherman Hemsley(n)

programme.title: Racing Stripes
programme.desc: A horse of a different pattern becomes a spoiler in a high-stakes race in the family-friendly comedy-drama. Nolan Walsh (Bruce Greenwood) is a farmer who once earned his living training racehorses before his wife was killed in an accident while riding, which led him to leave the racing game. Nolan tends to his farm and looks after his daughter Channing (Hayden Panettiere) and a large flock of animals, who speak to one another but not to humans. After a traveling circus passes through town, a zebra pony is left behind; Nolan takes in the animal, intending to return it to the circus, but at Channing's insistence they keep the zebra, naming him Stripes (voiced by Frankie Muniz). Channing loves Stripes, and the zebra is welcomed by the other critters on the farm, including grumpy Shetland pony Tucker (voiced by Dustin Hoffman), slow-moving hound dog Lightning (voiced by Snoop Dogg), a New Jersey-born pelican named Goose (voiced by Joe Pantoliano), skinny-brained rooster Reggie (voiced by Jeff Foxworthy), and deep-thinking goat Franny (voiced by Whoopi Goldberg). Channing discovers that Stripes can outrun nearly any horse around, and Woodzie (M. Emmett Walsh), a local character who has spent years handicapping the ponies, is convinced the zebra would be shoo-in in the Kentucky Open, a prestigious race held at the estate of champion horse breeder Clara Dalrymple (Wendie Malick). Channing believes Stripes can win, but he'll need the help of Nolan, who isn't so sure he's ready to start training again; meanwhile, Stripes gets plenty of advice from the other farm animals about his big step onto the race track. Mandy Moore, David Spade, and Steve Harvey also contribute their voice talents to the picture(n)

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
programme.desc: Larry and his historical pals journey to London to save the magic that brings the museum to life(n)

programme.title: Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium
programme.desc: Wonderfully weird and endearingly eccentric Mr Magorium (played by Dustin Hoffman) is the 243 year old proprietor of a delightfully old-fashioned toy shop that's crammed full of toys to thrill every child. But then this childhood institution is threatened when Mr Magorium decides to move on to his next adventure - death. He leaves the store in the care of Molly, his young assistant. But the shop is not happy, and suddenly the bright colours turn grey, the toys start to malfunction, and the very existence of the Wonder Emporium is threatened. Can Molly and the other employees revitalise the store and save it? The tale of its struggle for survival makes for an inspiring and entertaining feel good movie, packed with great gadgets and excellent performances(n)

programme.title: The Electric Company
programme.desc: Unmuffins. Jessica is on the case when the Electric Company world turns topsy-turvy with the pranksters becoming helpful while the Company gang becoming the opposite(n)

programme.desc: A young girl who discovers an abandoned garden on her uncle's large Victorian country estate, as well as an invalid cousin Colin she didn't realise she had. With the help of a local boy, the girl sets out to restore the garden and, once it is blooming again, she discovers it has magical powers(n)

Channing discovers that Stripes can outrun nearly any horse around, and Woodzie (M. Emmett Walsh), a local character who has spent years handicapping the ponies, is convinced the zebra would be shoo-in in the Kentucky Open, a prestigious race held at the estate of champion horse breeder Clara Dalrymple (Wendie Malick). Channing believes Stripes can win, but he'll need the help of Nolan, who isn't so sure he's ready to start training again; meanwhile, Stripes gets plenty of advice from the other farm animals about his big step onto the race track. Mandy Moore, David Spade, and Steve Harvey also contribute their voice talents to the picture(n)

programme.title: Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen
programme.desc: When her parents move house, city teen Lindsay Lohan tries to adjust to life in the suburbs(n)

programme.title: The Peanuts Movie
programme.desc: The delightfully hilarious gang from The Peanuts returns after 35 years for their silver screen debut. Join Charlie Brown, Lucy, Linus and friends on a new epic adventure while Snoopy tracks down his nemesis, the Red Baron. Charles M. Schulz's iconic characters are brought to life in state of the art 3D animation from Blue Sky Studios, the creators of the Ice Age films. Directed by Steve Martino. Screenwriters include Craig Schulz, one of Charles M. Schulz's sons and Bryan Schulz, Craig's son and Cornelius Uliano(n)

programme.title: The Haunted Mansion
programme.desc: A real-estate agent's family is stuck in a creepy old house crawling with ghosts(n)

programme.title: I Origins
programme.desc: Writer/director Mike Cahill's drama I Origins centers on medical student Ian Gray (Michael Pitt). Ian specializes in the evolution of the human eye. One day he attends a party where he meets a masked woman whose eyes transfix him, and soon the two fall in love. Years later, Ian makes a startling discovery in the lab, forcing him on a trek across the globe in order to uncover profound truths about mankind. I Origins screened at the 2014 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: Hard-hitting action with Patrick Swayze as a Zen martial arts expert hired by a small-town bar to clean up the clientele and eject the trouble-makers who are plaguing the establishment(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.sub-title: Love Is the Weapon of Choice
programme.desc: Love Is the Weapon of Choice. Bret and Jemaine become rivals for the attentions of the same woman, who happens to have an epileptic dog that has gone missing(n)

programme.title: Strictly Business
programme.desc: In this lively comedy, an African American yuppie rethinks life on the corporate fast-track after he falls in love with an ultra hip club promoter. Knowing that she finds him a total square, he seeks the advice of a swinging young mail boy(n)

programme.title: Jet Li's Fearless
programme.desc: Martial arts action based on the true story of the legendary Chinese hero Huo Yuan Jia, who seeks to rebuild his reputation after an error of judgment leads to his master's death. He learns that sportsmanship rather than brutality is the key to being a successful fighter(n)

programme.title: Windtalkers
programme.desc: Sergeant Joe Enders is assigned as bodyguard to Ben Yahzee, a Navajo radio operator. After the Japanese crack their codes, the Americans use the Navajo language to keep their signals secret. Joe must keep the code safe from the enemy, even if it means killing Ben to protect it(n)

programme.title: Seventh Son
programme.desc: A knight and his brave apprentice battle a malevolent witch plotting war against mankind(n)

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: Outcast Van Helsing is charged with a mission to go to the shadowy world of Transylvania and vanquish the evil Count Dracula. He joins forces with a beautiful woman descended from a powerful royal family, but finds that his goal of annihilating the enemy brings him face to face with his own past(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Jason Bourne searches for his own identity after a bout of amnesia, leading him on a globe-trekking trip in which he must avoid the zinging bullets of cops and assassins who are out to stop him before he uncovers the truth(n)

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: A helicopter pilot races to rescue his estranged daughter after a huge earthquake hits California(n)

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: A hilariously criminal Santa finds a measure of holiday redemption when he befriends a troubled kid. The traditional Christmas tale will never be the same after this cleverly twisted, merrily irreverent story of a Santa so bad that he's funny. Billy Bob Thornton stars (in a Golden Globe-nominated role) as Willie T. Stokes, a washed-up, wisecracking department store Santa who is only in the business for the criminal opportunities. Every Christmas Eve this Santa and his ingenious Elf' Willie's midget partner-in-crime Marcus (Tony Cox), crack the store safe and make off with their own holiday stash. But this year Santa and his Elf find their annual heist endangered by a pesky store manager (John Ritter), a savvy mall detective (Bernie Mac), a sexy Santa fan (Lauren Graham) and an 8-year-old misfit (Brett Kelly) who decides to believe that Willie: intoxicated, acid-tongued and felonious as he is, is the real Santa(n)

programme.title: Seventh Son
programme.desc: A knight and his brave apprentice battle a malevolent witch plotting war against mankind(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Thirteen is the new twelve in the third terrific chapter of Oscar® winners George Clooney and Steven Soderbergh's criminal caper series. With a stellar cast of criminal cohorts, it doesn't matter if it's eleven, twelve or thirteen -- it all adds up to fun. So ... are you in or are you out?(n)

programme.title: The Ruins
programme.desc: Gruesome horror about a group of American twentysomethings whose Mexican holiday takes a grisly turn. When a German holidaymaker begs the travellers to help find his brother, who went missing exploring an ancient Mayan temple, the group agrees to offer their assistance. Unfortunately, the mercy mission turns into a desperate fight for survival as the tourists discover that something deeply unpleasant is waiting for them in the ruins. Adapted from the novel by Scott B Smith(n)

programme.title: We Are Marshall
programme.desc: Inspirational true story of the residents of Huntington, West Virginia who rebuilt their football team after the tragic deaths of the original squad in a plane crash(n)

programme.title: Black Sea
programme.desc: A rogue submarine captain accepts a potentially lucrative offer to seek out a missing treasure in the Black Sea despite the sneaking suspicion that he may be double crossed in this sea adventure starring Jude Law and Scoot McNairy, and directed by Kevin Macdonald(n)

programme.title: Alpha Dog
programme.desc: This gritty, highly intense fact-based crime drama tells the sordid tale of a group of drug dealers who kidnap the teenage brother (Anton Yelchin) of a client (Ben Foster) who owes them money and refuses to pay. At first the hostage is treated like their guest, but soon things spiral out of control and a pivotal decision about his fate must be reached. The outstanding young cast is led by Justin Timberlake, Emile Hirsch and Shawn Hatosy. Bruce Willis and Sharon Stone are also featured(n)

programme.title: Love & Basketball
programme.desc: Gina Prince-Bythewood's warm and assured debut feature is a charming coming-of-age drama following the lives of Monica Wright and Quincy McCall. Both basketball stars for their respective high-school teams, as their careers progress through college and then into the professional leagues, their romance grows (although not without its ups and downs). The film is not just about shooting hoops but the pressure of being a sports star, the expectations young shoulders are expected to bear, and the familial problems that ensue(n)

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: Hard-hitting action with Patrick Swayze as a Zen martial arts expert hired by a small-town bar to clean up the clientele and eject the trouble-makers who are plaguing the establishment(n)

programme.title: Face Off
programme.desc: FBI agent Sean agrees to have the face of terrorist Castor grafted on so that he can foil a bomb plot. But when Castor wakes up from his coma, he forces doctors to graft Sean's face onto his, sparking a deadly game of cat and mouse(n)

programme.title: We Are Your Friends
programme.desc: We Are Your Friends is a romantic drama based around one young DJ's dreams to make it big in the electronic dance music genre. Cole (Zac Efron), who dreams about becoming a big player in the music industry, meets James (Wes Bentley), a more established disc jockey who takes him under his wing. After some time, Cole begins to develop feelings for Sophie (Emily Ratajkowski), who is dating James. Eventually, Cole must make some hard choices about his career as he moves close to Sophie, causing a fracture in the relationship between James and himself. The film co-stars Jon Bernthal (The Walking Dead), and is the first film directed by Max Joseph(n)

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A lonely, recently divorced teacher has an affair with a much-younger man. However, their relationship takes a terrifying turn as he grows obsessed with her(n)

programme.title: Unfriended
programme.desc: One year after a humiliating viral video drove a teenage girl to commit suicide, her high-school classmates are terrorised by an anonymous online presence seeking revenge(n)

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: "Say hello to my little friend." The drug-crazed, bloodshot performance by Al Pacino is the rock at the heart of this extreme and controversial film penned by Oliver Stone(n)

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: Through a series of freak occurrences, a group of actors shooting a big-budget war movie are forced to become the soldiers they are portraying(n)

programme.title: According to Spencer
programme.desc: Jesse Bradford and Mia Kirshner star in this cheerful comedy about chance meetings. Spencer (Bradford) gets a job as a clerk at an ad agency, then is delighted to learn that an old crush (Kirshner) works there as well. One question remains: Will she find him as irresistable? David Krumholtz, Brad Rowe, Florence Stanley, Marissa Ribisi(n)

programme.title: Catacombs
programme.desc: Film about a disturbed young American woman who travels to Paris to visit her sister and ends up losing her mind in the notorious corpse-lined catacombs(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: A group of amnesiac teenagers awaken in a deadly maze, and search desperately for an escape route while gathering clues that could reveal the reason for their imprisonment. Meanwhile, dreams of a shadowy organisation hint at a sinister agenda(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas and the other Gladers journey across a brutal, obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the mysterious organisation known as WCKD(n)

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: Oscar-winning biopic spanning a twenty-year period in the life of eccentric millionaire Howard Hughes, including the films, the women and his pioneering success as a world-class aviator. Visually stunning drama(n)

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: Charter schools in the U.S.; the Ryan Lochte Olympic scandal; and Donald Trump's 2016 presidential campaign are discussed(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Saturdaze. Travis' clash with a critic finds Spencer trying to play mediator; Charles becomes a reluctant bearer of bad news in his new role with the team; Joe has a one-on-one meeting with Andre; Ricky is shocked by his father's desire for a bigger role in his life(n)

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.desc: Part 7: Ordinary Death. The defense presents its case in the trial of The State v. Nasir Khan(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials'
programme.desc: A look at "Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials," the 2015 sequel to "The Maze Runner" (2014) in which Thomas, Teresa, and the rest of the Gladers prepare for phase two of their trials after narrowly escaping the first test. The film stars Dylan O'Brien, Kaya Scodelario and Thomas Brodie-Sangster, and is directed by Wes Ball(n)

programme.title: Everything Is Copy - Nora Ephron: Scripted & Unscripted
programme.desc: Profiling multitalented writer Nora Ephron. Friends and family discuss the late Ephron's keen wit, her remarkable body of work—which includes everything from newspaper columns to classic films—and her private battle with leukemia(n)

programme.title: Street Kings
programme.desc: Tom Ludlow is a veteran LAPD cop who finds life difficult to navigate after the death of his wife. When evidence implicates him in the execution of a fellow officer, he is forced to go up against the cop culture he's been a part of his entire career, ultimately leading him to question the loyalties of everyone around him(n)

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this nail-biting adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of climbers successfully scale Mount Everest, only to be faced with tragedy when a monster snowstorm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent(n)

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: Oscar-winning biopic spanning a twenty-year period in the life of eccentric millionaire Howard Hughes, including the films, the women and his pioneering success as a world-class aviator. Visually stunning drama(n)

programme.desc: Thomas and the other Gladers journey across a brutal, obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the mysterious organisation known as WCKD(n)

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: In the late 80's, the wrestler Randy Robinson is at the peak of his career. Twenty years later, his stardom is nothing but a memory, but his passion for the sport keeps him going(n)

programme.title: Horsemen of the Apocalypse
programme.desc: Dennis Quaid stars in this thriller about a hardened, recently widowed cop who makes a shocking discovery while investigating serial killings rooted in the biblical prophecy of the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials'
programme.desc: A look at "Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials," the 2015 sequel to "The Maze Runner" (2014) in which Thomas, Teresa, and the rest of the Gladers prepare for phase two of their trials after narrowly escaping the first test. programme.title: The Great Outdoors
programme.desc: Comedy in which a quiet family holiday by the lake is interrupted when the wife's obnoxious salesman brother, his chain-smoking wife and their loathsome twin daughters appear on the cabin doorstep expecting to share the vacation(n)

programme.title: Frankie and Johnny
programme.desc: Al Pacino stars as Johnny, who has just been released from prison and gets a job in a café beside waitress Frankie. Frankie is a loner but Johnny is determined that their romance will blossom(n)

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: John Cusack is in a groove as the owner of a Chicago used-record store in this smart 2000 romantic comedy. It's the story of a man who reflects on his messy love life while paying meticulous attention to all things vinyl. The charmer is based on the novel by Nick Hornby. Iben Hjejle, Jack Black, Todd Louiso, Joan Cusack, Tim Robbins, Lisa Bonet(n)

programme.title: MI-5
programme.desc: When head of counter-terrorism, Harry Pearce, goes missing, his apprentice Will Holloway sets off to find out what happened. With an impending attack on London looming and Holloway discovering a conspiracy running from Vietnam to the Mediterranean, he is on a race with time and must solve the case before it's too late(n)

programme.title: Hollywoodland
programme.desc: Stylish 50s-set drama about a private eye investigating one of the entertainment industry's most enduring mysteries, the apparent suicide of Superman star George Reeves. However, his enquiries lead him deep into Hollywood's seedy underbelly, uncovering a love triangle involving a former showgirl and a powerful studio executive(n)

programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as maths genius John Nash, who finds that paranoia and schizophrenia are problems he may never solve. Acclaimed drama. Mature themes/flashing images. (2001)(136 mins)(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Historia basada en hechos reales acerca de un congresista que ayudó a rebeldes afganos en los 80 a pelear contra los soviéticos por medio de dinero y armas. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.desc: Un distrito Nueva Zelanda abre en Nueva York, pero Bret y Jemain están distraídos por su apariencia. (cc)(n)

programme.desc: Periodistas deportivos miran el lado serio de los deportes contemporáneos. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Hard Knocks Training Camp With Los Angeles Rams
programme.desc: Detrás de los flashes y las transmisiones televisivas que rompen todos los récords de audiencia, existe una gran cantidad de jugadores de la NFL que son seres humanos y que tienen una vida como el resto de los mortales. Ellos, al igual que los entrenadores, tienen familia y deben recorrer, primero como novatos, un arduo camino para llegar a lo más alto en el fútbol americano de los Estados Unidos. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: Película en la que se narra la historia de los mineros que quedaron atrapados 700 metros bajo tierra, después de un derrumbe en la mina San José en Chile, el 5 de agosto de 2010. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn
programme.desc: Como muchos otros inmigrantes irlandeses, Eilis llega a los Estados Unidos en la década de 1950 con mucha esperanza, pero también con lo suficiente que perder en esta aventura de encontrar trabajo y acomodarse lejos de su pueblo natal. Hallar el amor junto al joven italiano Tony y sentirse abrigada por una comunidad cristiana de Brooklyn, la hacen sentir en casa. Pero una noticia funesta desde Irlanda mutará prematuramente sus planes. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Riding in Cars With Boys
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore protagoniza a una madre soltera que trata de superar la sensación de que no ha tomado buenas decisiones en su vida. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Life or Something like It
programme.desc: Una reportera de TV decide cambiar su forma de vivir luego de que un vidente sin hogar le dice que sólo le queda una semana de vida(n)

programme.desc: Como muchos otros inmigrantes irlandeses, Eilis llega a los Estados Unidos en la década de 1950 con mucha esperanza, pero también con lo suficiente que perder en esta aventura de encontrar trabajo y acomodarse lejos de su pueblo natal. programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: Película basada en hechos reales sucedidos en 1820 donde un barco ballenero cayó preso de un cachalote, dejando varado a sus tripulantes en medio del mar durante 90 días. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Night Of *
programme.desc: Stone se encuentra, de repente, en el epicentro de atención, después de una controversial defensa que ejerce su astuto abogado en los estrados. Cuando la tensión va creciendo, el juicio de Naz alcanza su punto más álgido, en una jornada donde podría quedar todo definido. O casi todo. Hay mucho en juego. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Ballers *
programme.desc: En el codiciado mundo del fútbol americano todos los movimientos deben ser estudiados con precisión, para no dar ni un paso en falso. La visita sorpresa de Andre a la oficina obliga a Spencer a mantenerse un escalón por delante de su rival. Joe, por su parte, descubre algunos secretos para nada agradables sobre su compañero, mientras que Ricky trata de recomponer la relación con su padre y Charles no quiere perder a un amigo cercano. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Vice Principals *
programme.desc: La doctora Belinda Brown se ve sorprendida y totalmente abrumada por la inesperada llegada de su exmarido, situación que la pone muy nerviosa, ya que no sabe cómo manejarse ante su repentina presencia. programme.desc: Una estudiante de secundaria quiere convertirse en una campeona de patinaje en hielo pero su madre quiere que vaya a Harvard(n)

programme.title: The Luzhin Defence
programme.desc: El romance inusual e imprevisible entre un talentoso jugador de ajedrez y la hija de una aristócrata. John Turturro, Emily Watson, Geraldine James, Stuart Wilson(n)

programme.title: A Girl in the River The Price of Forgiveness
programme.desc: Más de 1000 mujeres son asesinadas en nombre del "honor" en Pakistán cada año. Esta historia sigue la historia de un sobreviviente que se enamora y vive para contarlo. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Godsend
programme.desc: Varios años después que el niño muerto de una pareja es clonado, el nuevo niño comienza a mostrar extraños y violentos comportamientos. Greg Kinnear, Robert De Niro, Rebecca Romijn-Stamos. Nick Hamm dirigió(n)

programme.title: Olive Kitteridge
programme.desc: En un pequeño pueblo de Maine, una profesora de matemáticas ayuda a un estudiante inteligente, cuya madre sufre de depresión. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Olive Kitteridge
programme.desc: Christopher le sugiere terapias a su madre después de que ella y Henry tienen un incómodo episodio durante una cena con amigos. Más tarde, Olive visita a Christopher y a su segunda esposa en Nueva York, pero de repente vuelve a Maine. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Real Sports with Bryant Gumbel
programme.desc: Periodistas deportivos miran el lado serio de los deportes contemporáneos. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Point Break (Sin límites)
programme.desc: Johnny Utah se une al FBI, dejando atrás su rebelde pasado. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Tobey Maguire returns as the Webbed Wonder, battling evil in New York with Kirsten Dunst at his side(n)

programme.desc: Will Smith plays heavyweight champion Muhammad Ali in Michael Mann's biopic, which chronicles the boxer's life from 1964 to '74(n)

programme.title: The Green Inferno
programme.desc: In this gruesome tribute to the Italian cannibal films of yesteryear, a group of young American activists on a mission to save the rain forest are captured by a sadistic tribe of flesh-eating locals(n)

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Prison inmates form a football team to challenge the prison guards(n)

programme.title: El Cantante
programme.desc: A zesty soundtrack spices up this stirring but tragic profile of pioneering Latino salsa singer Hector Lavoe (Marc Anthony), who was popular in the 1960s, '70s and '80s. Jennifer Lopez, Anthony's real-life wife, costars as his spouse, and the cinematic sparks fly when the two are onscreen. Lopez also served as producer. Directed by Leon Ichaso, who co-wrote the script with David Darmstaedter and Todd Anthony Bello. John Ortiz, Manny Perez, Federico Castelluccio, Vincent Laresca, Romi Diaz(n)

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: A South African mercenary and a fisherman try to recover a priceless diamond amid the civil war in 1990s Sierra Leone(n)

programme.title: This Boy's Life
programme.desc: Michael Caton-Jones rites-of-passage film stars teenage Leonardo DiCaprio and Ellen Barkin as his mother who flee dad and elder brother back East and end up in Washington where she falls under the spell of old-fashioned lover Robert De Niro, little realising his hidden penchant for tyranny(n)

programme.title: Lucky Numbers
programme.desc: Crime comedy inspired by the 1980 Pennsylvania lottery scandal. A local TV weatherman fallen on hard times gets entangled in a shady plan to rig the state lottery, with the help of the ditzy model who announces the numbers. Before long, the scheme starts to unravel(n)

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: A charming Cameron Diaz stars as an uptight stock trader who meets and marries immature slacker Ashton Kutcher one drunken night in Las Vegas. They agree to an annulment---until he wins a $3 million jackpot with her quarter. Ordered by a judge to live for six months as husband and wife before either can claim the prize, they're bound to fall in love---if they don't kill each other first. Lake Bell(n)

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Insurgent
programme.desc: In this thrilling and nail-biting entry in the Divergent series, Tris and Four seek refuge outside of the city with the Amity faction. They convene with other Divergents and exiled survivors, and plot to fight back against the warmongering Dauntless and despot Jeanine Matthews(n)

programme.title: Brokeback Mountain
programme.desc: Ang Lee's adaptation of E. Annie Proulx's story Brokeback Mountain stars Jake Gyllenhaal and Heath Ledger as young cowboys named Jack Twist and Ennis Del Mar. Each of them is hired to corral sheep on the title location and they soon bond very closely. Their platonic relationship explodes into a physical one, but eventually the two are separated when their job comes to an end. Although the two follow different life paths -- one becoming a father of two and the other marrying into a successful business -- they have a reunion years later. Each is affected profoundly by the rekindling of their old feelings for each other. Those feelings lead each to consider what continuing their hidden relationship would cost them. The screenplay was written by Pulitzer Prize-winning author Larry McMurtry and Diana Ossana(n)

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: A South African mercenary and a fisherman try to recover a priceless diamond amid the civil war in 1990s Sierra Leone(n)

programme.title: Kill the Messenger

programme.title: Fracture
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins, Ryan Gosling and David Strathairn star in Gregory Hoblit's twist-filled legal drama. When top airplane engineer Ted Crawford discovers that his wife has been cheating on him he takes a devastatingly direct route to revenge: he drives home and shoots his errant spouse in the face. He then waits for the police to turn up and confesses to the crime. With his wife in a coma, Crawford is arrested and enters the justice system. It should, of course, be the simplest prosecution ever. And lawyer Willy Beachum can be forgiven for thinking that his last case as a criminal attorney (before he switches to company law) will be a doddle. But once in court, Crawford, representing himself, starts to tear apart the ample evidence that's stacked against him... Can he possibly get away with his crime? Also starring Rosamund Pike, Billy Burke and Fiona Shaw(n)
